Title: Safewords, Beginning to Expert
Book Description: 'Learn how and why people use safewords during rough sex play and BDSM. They're codewords to stop activity in case of trauma or the need to discuss what's going on- with no repercussions. Did you know that tops/doms use safewords- too? Practice saying safewords aloud during a brief exercise. Hear about examples when safewords failed and how many people are reluctant to use them- despite their best intent.'

Title: A Tour of Adult Toys
Book Description: 'See a variety of sex toys from simple and cheap to the cutting edge- and learn the best uses of each along with how to clean and store them. We'll demonstrate different materials- and how to share them with others. Hands-on (but not genitals-on) experimentation after the Q&A.'
